name: SURVIVE (itch) (HolySkullStudios)
description:
Ever wanted to know what it was like in the apocalypse? Well this game is definitely NOT CLOSE TO THAT. It's just a bunch of random zombies sorry bucko. But there is some features you can do that some may like.

  • Log In/Sign Up feature - Create your own account or log in to have your stuff back
  • A GIFT! When you first create an account you get 100 SC
  • A shop! There is some cool cosmetics, guns, n junk in there
  • A Multiplayer mode! Coming soon!

and uh that's all the cool stuff I guess.

GET READY TO SHOOT UP SOME ZOMBIES!

Game made by HolySkullStudios, two weird scratch developers who are trying to achieve their goal.
